div.p: Adverse Reaction resources are used to provide information about specific reactions to a substance. These are normally associated with an AllergyIntolerance resource, but can be reported on their own when no assumption of further reactions is being made.

If there are multiple reactions to occur due to an exposure to a substance, each of those reactions would be result in separate instances of an Adverse Reaction resource. As an example, if a subject experienced a rash, vomiting, and anaphylaxis, those would be three separate AdverseReactions that each had the same Manifestation.occurrenceDate.
